title: Honyek
author: Honyek
content: Argentina defeated Brazil in their men's world  cup qualifying match held on Tuesday, the 21th November 2023 at Maracana stadium Brazil. This ended one of the longest unbeaten records in the history of world football as Brazil had never been defeated on such match on their home  land. This was made possible by a solidary goal from the head of Argentina striker Nicolas Otamendi. Brazil ended the game with ten men as one of their strikers, Joelinton was sent out on a red card for a push.In Rio De Janeiro Brazil, the kick-off was delayed for approximately thirty minutes as a result of the clashes between the police and the fans in the stadium during the national anthems. The tensions were calmed after the Argentina captain and striker Lionel Messi led his team back to the changing rooms.However, Argentina team remains on top of the standings of the south American qualifying group for the  FIFA men's world cup 2026.Five times men's world cup champion Brazil is now the sixth in the group after a  third straight defeat.The top six will qualify for the FIFA men's world cup 2026 finals that will be held in USA, Canada, and Mexico.The country in the seventh position will go on to participate in the FIFA play-off tournament  along with five teams from other countries, in a bid for the two remaining places in the world cup finals.What do you think about the FIFA  men's world cup qualifiers? Predict whether the five times world champion of the tournament, Brazil will qualify for the FIFA men's world cup 2026?

comments.author: Yogee
comments.body: You can join the discussion in this thread instead of opening a new one https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5431360.0

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: OP it is nice you have such a good content to present here as it matters alot but just as the above poster has mentioned, do you not think it would be nice you do the needful because because there is already a thread for that which is still very much active and this post could contribute to the already existing thread. So I will advise you continue the conversation there and lock up this thread to avoid duplication of thread with the same purpose or function.
